Text: Very underrated multiplayer game. Done by the dev who did the 2nd release of Counterstrike (de_Train etc) it takes the CS gameplay and improves every single aspect of it while adding even more stuff. Huge selection of weapons and gadgets. Like seemingly every other game released by EA it was rushed out before it was finished and ended up getting a bad name. Last I checked there was still a handful of servers running it. The single player campaign is pretty forgettable though.
Ye Churchills Dog is right it's kind of Counterstrike, but i like it.. thx mate
